Hi Eben,


> I am on a contract where the chaps are using 
> target="_blank" href="http://ADO.NET">ADO.NET Data Services (now WCF Data 
> Services).

> So I was wondering whether this qualifies as REST.  It 
> has all the url structures and stuff but (as far as I can tell) that doesn't 
> make it REST.

O'Reilly has a book that covers using .Net 3.5 WCF to make RESTful web services.

http://oreilly.com/catalog/9780596519216

There's nothing RESTful about ADO.Net itself but MS created some URI parsing routines that are similar to Jersey's.

Cheers,

Mark W.
